data.name: My Singing Monsters - Cold Island Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
Unlock the Sweti Settlement Island Skin available on Cold Island. Alongside the cosmetic makeover to Cold Island, you'll receive the following permanent boosts to Cold Island upon purchasing.
  • 10% speed up incubation in Nursery
  • 15% speed up of Monster Coin production
  • 2x multiplier for Wishing Torch effect

Once an Island Skin has been bought, its Boosts are automatically added to that Island. The Skin does not need to be activated to use the Boosts.

These Boosts only apply to regular Cold Island, and not Mirror Cold Island.

Note: You will need to exit and reopen your game for the Island Skin to appear in your inventory.

data.short_description: Unlock the Sweti Settlement Island Skin available on Cold Island. Alongside the cosmetic makeover to Cold Island, you'll receive a variety of permanent boosts to your Cold Island.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.0 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660 or equivalent
